attributes.action: call on Cadbury Trebor Bassett to bring back the Cadbury Spira.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many chocolate lovers comment on the fact that the Spira are no longer available. These chocolate bars were chocolate at it's best! 

We want Cadbury to start making them again!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
